short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Its time to cook da duck!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This item is a quick fun game to play from your browser! There are 4 game modes and many cosmetic items to collect! 
This game appears on the top right hand side of your screen and launches the game cook da duck! 
Cook da duck can be played with an internet connection anywhere, anytime! You can play this game in class, at home or even outside! 
This game is great to pass the time and you can quickly close it before your teacher or manager checks to see what "work" you are doing by clicking off of the app! 

Change Log: 
Version 1.0 
+ Game is fully released!
